items.description: "Home bias is about as bad as it's ever been in the United States," ETF.com's Dave Nadig told CNBC's "ETF Edge" this week.

items.title: Bitcoin rallies to within 1% of all-time high, gaining safe-haven status during shutdown
items.description: Bitcoin is trading within striking distance of its record price as the U.S. government shutdown enters its third day.

items.title: From data to culture: How international brands are trying to crack the code on the fickle Chinese consumer
items.description: Western brands are revamping efforts to reach the Chinese consumer despite the economic slowdown.

items.title: Chicago Fed President Goolsbee 'a little wary' about cutting interest rates too quickly
items.description: The central banker indicated that pressure is coming to both sides of the Fed's so-called dual mandate of stable prices and low unemployment.
